name: Virgin Malaysian curly (AFRO Kinky) 100g/1 bundle & 300g/3 bundles
description:
Create your very own custom bundle! Choose from desired bundle & receive them at a discounted price! Mix and match hair lengths for a different look! Textures: AFRO Kinky 

100% Pure Virgin Hair made to blend beautifully with the kinkiest Hair! Our kinky hair is made to blend with 4A-4C natural hair. It is very full and thick yet soft, and lightweight. It is our lowest luster collection and can be used to add versatility to styling, fullness, and/or length. Each bundle weighs approximately 4oz (113.4 grams) and comes in its Natural Virgin unaltered color. We recommend 2- 3 bundles for a full head.This is our most tightly curled hair. The hair has a tighter curl pattern than our regular Kinky Curly hair and consists of an array of fabulously springy textured kinks and coils. The hair has a low luster and is extremely soft to the touch. Can be worn in its curly state or  blow dried for a sleeker look. The hair will revert back its coily texture after being washed.  

The cuticles of this hair are aligned in the same direction, which prevents it from tangling. The hair is machine wefted onto highly durable wefts, so shedding is minimized. Despite this, we still recommend that you use a Weft Sealer to seal your wefts for added protection. 

Texture: This hair has been steam treated to achieve the Afro kinky curl texture. The treatment gives the hair a more consistent and uniform curl pattern, however since the processing is done by hand there may be slight variations in texture between bundles. Some bundles may appear coiler than others. 

(Please note that each of our bundles are measured by their length when straight.)

**Email LavishBeauty@hotmail.com if you have any questions about purchasing your LoveLavish Hair Bundle! Hair can be dyed, straightened, curled, and styled in any way. LoveLavish Virgin Hair can service you as long as 6 months to a year with proper care. Please refer to our Love Lavish Hair Guide.

Hair Extension Type: Weft Hair Extension 
Material: Human Hair 
Human Hair Type: Malaysian Hair 
Hair Grade: Virgin Hair AAAAA 
Place of Origin: Malaysian
Weight: 100g per pack 
Length: 8" - 14" Color: Natural Dark Brown 
Soft and Full of luster.

Free shipping

****WE SHIP WORLDWIDE!! IF YOU LIVE OUTSIDE THE UK, PRICES ARE AUTOMATICALLY CONVERTED TO YOUR COUNTRIES CURRENCY AT CHECKOUT. THE PRICES LISTED ARE IN GBP. THANK YOU****

name: Virgin Filipino Hair (Body wave) 300g/3 bundles & 400g/4 bundles
description:
Filipino hair surpasses the standards of all hair on the market today. Filipino hair is thicker than Indian Hair, Brazilian hair, and even Malaysian hair thus being able to withstand color, heat, and manipulation without jeopardizing quality.
